Articles.Content: I thought I saw a mod that would allow for it but I can't seem to find it. Does anyone know if it exists or am I making things up....Again? I would love for my favorite kerbal to be the jack of all trades.

You mean the second one in this pack here?
With some reading and tweaking you might be able to create your super kerbal.

[url]http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/117530-HMV-s-Simple-MM-Configs-NEW-2015-11-19-HeatShield-Decoupler[/url]
That a great start. I'll have to play around with the configs and see

This would make sense for levels 4 or 5, in that you could choose a secondary or tertiary profession from there. It would still require an interplanetary trip and back based on the current model for level progression.

Peace.
